value.description: The panoply of the Legio Custodes represents the pinnacle of the armourer's art. Far more sophisticated than production-model Legion power armour, it is fashioned with rare auramite alloy such as that used for the armour the Emperor Himself wears in battle. Each suit is unique to the Custodian Guard who wears it.\n\nThe warriors of the Legio Custodes are uniquely created, genetically engineered living weapons, superhuman in physical and mental prowess and skilled in battle beyond even the warriors of the Legiones Astartes. Their martial arts are also singular and centred on individual combat, where one Custodian might slaughter dozens of lesser opponents with blinding speed and slay would-be assassins and champions with contemptuous ease.

Completing a set of Custodes power armour, the Custodes pattern power armour helmet also represents the pinnacle of the armourer's art. Fashioned in the rare auramite alloy of the Emperor's armour, each helm is is unique to the Custodian Guard who wears it, and is fitted with arrays of proximity sensors and refractor field generators to further enhance their defences.\n\nThe warriors of the Legio Custodes are uniquely created, genetically engineered living weapons, superhuman in physical and mental prowess and skilled in battle beyond even the warriors of the Legiones Astartes. Their martial arts are also singular and centred on individual combat, where one Custodian might slaughter dozens of lesser opponents with blinding speed and slay would-be assassins and champions with contemptuous ease.

Aquilon pattern terminator armour is a variant uniquely designed to operate in conjunction with the physiology of the Legio Custodes. Its origins lie with the Cataphractii suits ofthe Space Marine Legions, but with far greater power capacity and customised neuro-fibre uplinks, it is said, redesigned by the mind of the Emperor Himself for His elite forces.\n\nThe warriors of the Legio Custodes are uniquely created, genetically engineered living weapons, superhuman in physical and mental prowess and skilled in battle beyond even the warriors of the Legiones Astartes. Their martial arts are also singular and centred on individual combat, where one Custodian might slaughter dozens of lesser opponents with blinding speed and slay would-be assassins and champions with contemptuous ease.

Aquilon pattern terminator armour helmet, completing a set of Aquilon pattern Terminator armour worn by the warriors of the Legio Custodes. Derived from the Cataphractii pattern helmets worn by Space Marine Terminators, the customised neuro-fibre uplinks used in the Aquilon pattern helmets are said to have been redesigned by the mind of the Emperor Himself for His elite forces.\n\nThe warriors of the Legio Custodes are uniquely created, genetically engineered living weapons, superhuman in physical and mental prowess and skilled in battle singular and centred on individual combat, where one Custodian might slaughter dozens of lesser opponents with blinding speed and slay would-be assassins and champions with contemptuous ease.

The artificer power armour worn by Constantin Valdor, Captain-General of the Legio Custodes. Like all the wargear of the Custodians, the Captain-General's armour is fashioned from rare auramite alloy.\n\nConstantin Valdor sits at the right hand of the Emperor as perhaps His most trusted companion and guardian, a watchman of inviolable purpose and all but unmatched fighting skill. Such in fact is Valdor's martial power and superhuman physical and mental abilities that there are those, even within the Imperial Court, who have in whispers called him 'Primarch' in all but name.

Such in fact is Valdor's martial power and superhuman physical and mental abilities that there are those, even within the Imperial Court, who have in whispers called him 'Primarch' in all but name.

The One True Armour is an unique set of power armour created and worn by the Emperor of Mankind. Fashione in auramite alloy, this panoply of war far exceeds any armour wrought by mortal hands.\n\nThe Emperor, the Master of Mankind, has reunited the clans of old Earth following Long Night. Now that the Unification Wars are over, He seeks to bring together the lost worlds of humanity in a Great Crusade. Through Him, the Imperium of Man is born.

The Crown of the Emperor of Mankind. Wrought of gold and shaped as a laurel wreath, the Emeperor's Crown was made by His own hand through His knowledge of warpcraft.\n\nThe Emperor, the Master of Mankind, has reunited the clans of old Earth following Long Night.
